tgt_original: 有樂行跡所行愚惑，此名初行跡； 復有樂行跡所行速疾；

src_original: ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvrarāgo bhavati,  tīvradveṣo bhavati,  tīvramoho bhavati |  so'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |  so'bhīkṣaṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |  so'bhīkṣaṇaṃ tīvramohatayā mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |

abhīkṣṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |  abhīkṣṇaṃ tīvramohatayā mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |  tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni |
tgt_original: 或有一人貪欲熾盛，瞋恚、愚癡熾盛，所行甚苦，不與行本相應，彼人五根愚闇亦不捷疾。

src_original: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam |
tgt_original: 所謂信根、精進根、念根、慧根、定根。

src_original: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ dhandhātvānmṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya |
tgt_original: 或有一人無欲、無婬； 然於貪欲，恒自偏少不慇懃，為瞋恚、愚癡極為減少，五根捷疾無有放逸。
